resources.string:
Thanks for updating!
New in this version:
–Keyboard blocking setting will be remembered.
–Navbar visibility setting will be remembered.
Thanks for installing!\nJust connect your phone as you would on your computer.\nTo unlock the keyboard, use the keyboard button top right. Your settings will be saved.
